text: Beirut's districts. Rmeil () is one of the districts of Beirut, the capital of Lebanon. It is located near Ashrafieh, and Saifi. Two Greek Orthodox churches are situated there, and the Sursock Museum. Saint George Hospital University Medical Center is also located in Rmeil.
